description: A logger client for errors/exceptions in Meteor JS projects
engines#1: We specify npm >= 2 to get proper local dependency support in
engines#2: application itself ; this is not a package dependency per se.
name: filog

scripts.compile: rm -r lib/* ; npm i && babel --presets es2015,stage-0 -d lib/ src/
scripts.test-unit: npm run test-compile && time -p mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/unit
scripts.test-integration: npm run test-compile && time -p mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/integration
scripts.test: npm run test-compile && time -p mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/*
